text: Your court is in disarray, your retainers bicker and your armies lull around. Collapse is imminent, unless careful decisions are made.
Hold faithfulness and sincerity as your first principles.
Humility is the strong bedrock of all virtues.

A virtuous man need not stand alone - he who cultivates it will have companions.	true
effect_bundles_localised_description_ironic_harmony_resource_level_4	A man who sets his mind on benevolence need not fear evil.
[[b]]Harmony[[/b]] can be increased by assignments, high satisfaction, and unique buildings.
[[b]]Harmony[[/b]] can be decreased by assignments, low satisfaction, and amount of armies on field.
• Increases experience with characters and units
• Assignments can increase Harmony but also provide buffs to character and units
• Allows the recruitment of new characters

Moral cultivation, the virtues of the universe, yin and yang - at the center of them all is the foundation of harmony. Without balance, a friendship, a family, a government, even a world cannot function properly.

Moral cultivation, the virtues of the universe, yin and yang - at the center of them all is the foundation of harmony. Without balance, a friendship, a family, a government, even a world cannot function properly.
By spending time reviewing the Analects and quietly contemplating about yourself, internal harmony can be restored.
By reciting rhapsodies of old and composing new works, an inspirational wave can flow over your court.

Moral cultivation, the virtues of the universe, yin and yang - at the center of them all is the foundation of harmony. Without balance, a friendship, a family, a government, even a world cannot function properly.
